text:
Role: Super Rad Data Management (2012â€“Present, with reduced activity since 2018)
Jof Davies acted as a CRM and IT consultant for insurance-sector clients. Responsibilities included CRM migrations, data cleansing, system restructuring, and implementing renewal workflows specific to insurance operations.

Key projects included:
- Multiple insurance CRM migrations with zero data loss
- Designing structured data models for customer, policy, and renewal tracking
- Implementing automated workflows for renewals, cancellations, and follow-ups
- Creating bulk data cleaning routines for Excel and SQL-based systems
- Delivering technical support around IT, hosting, and systems integration

This period demonstrates high proficiency in CRM architecture, data modelling, and operational automation design.
